resources.string: The Ur-Quan Masters Live Wallpaper Settings

Due to U.S. Copyright restrictions, the content pack used by this software cannot be distributed with it, and must be obtained separately.
To download the content pack, link here: http://prdownloads.sourceforge.net/sc2/uqm-0.6.0-content.uqm?download
Then click "OK" to locate the content pack on your SD card
Please select a content pack from the Settings menu
is not a valid content pack
Location of the content pack from The Ur-Quan Masters
